abstract: Elliott Associates’ $2 billion bid for Novell could draw out other suitors that have dawdled, Breakingviews says.
snippet: Elliott Associates’ $2 billion bid for Novell could draw out other suitors that have dawdled, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: A Novell buyout is long overdue, Breakingviews says. The software maker’s shares have languished for 20 years, yet it generates healthy profit and has no debt.

headline.main: Will Elliott’s Novell Offer Lure Other Bidders?
